OCR_info.question_text: $\square$ 안에 알맞은 수를 써넣으시오.(1)$ \begin{array}{r}7.84 \rightarrow 0.0101 \square \text { 개 } \\ -2.52 \rightarrow 0.0101 \square \text { 개 } \\ \hline \square \leftarrow 0.0101 \square \text { 개 }\end{array} $ (2)$ \begin{array}{r}9.23 \rightarrow 0.0101 \square \text { 개 } \\ -5.6 \rightarrow 0.0101 \square \text { 개 } \\ \hline \square \leftarrow 0.0101 \square \text { 개 }\end{array} $ (3)$ \begin{array}{r}4.65 \rightarrow 0.00101 \square \text { 개 } \\ -1.878 \rightarrow 0.00101 \square \text { 애 } \\ \hline \square \leftarrow 0.00101 \square \text { 개 }\end{array} $

question_bbox.text: $\square$ 안에 알맞은 수를 써넣으시오.(1)$ \begin{array}{r}7.84 \rightarrow 0.0101 \square \text { 개 } \\ -2.52 \rightarrow 0.0101 \square \text { 개 } \\ \hline \square \leftarrow 0.0101 \square \text { 개 }\end{array} $ (2)$ \begin{array}{r}9.23 \rightarrow 0.0101 \square \text { 개 } \\ -5.6 \rightarrow 0.0101 \square \text { 개 } \\ \hline \square \leftarrow 0.0101 \square \text { 개 }\end{array} $ (3)$ \begin{array}{r}4.65 \rightarrow 0.00101 \square \text { 개 } \\ -1.878 \rightarrow 0.00101 \square \text { 애 } \\ \hline \square \leftarrow 0.00101 \square \text { 개 }\end{array} $
